beer.name: Kells Irish Lager
beer.description: An Irish style lager with a smooth mellow flavor and an apple crisp finish. Perfect for floating Guinness! The recipe was developed for our friends at Kell's Irish Restaurant and Pub.
beer.grains: Great Western Pale, Crystal -15, Wheat & Acidulated Malts.
Great Western Pale, Crystal -15, Wheat & Acidulated Malts.
beer.yeast: Czech Pils Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
